Class FarmMe

java.lang.Object
FarmMe
public class FarmMe extends Object
Represents a farm which have cows and vets A farm can have many cows raising and many vets working for
Version:
1.5
Author:
Yağmur Saygılı 2385698 saygili.yagmur@metu.edu.tr

    Method

    addCow()
    Method to add a cow object into the arraylist;cows Requesting required information to create cow object Creating a cows object with given information Adding to cows variable with cows.add
    void
    addTreatment(int vetID, int tagNo)
    First searching if there is a vet with given ID and there is a cow with given tagNo Then asking for required information to create treatment Creating treatment object Asking how many medications there will be for this treatment Asking for necessary information to create medication object in a loop for the number of medications Iteratively assigning medications to the created treatment
    void
    addVet()
    Asking user for required information to create a vet object Creates a vet object with given information Adds the created vet object into the vet list
    void
    deleteCow(int tagNo)
    Searching for cow with the given tagNo in the list of cows If found save the index number of the cow and delete from the cows list If not found print relevant error message
    void
    deleteVet(int vetID)
    Searching for vet object in the vets list with the given vetID If found delete the veterinary from the list of vets If not found display appropriate error message

    exit()
    Terminating the program with succesful completion
    void
    getCowDetails(int tagNo)
    Search for the cow in the list with the given tagNo If found display its details with using printDetails method in Cow class If not found display an error message
    void
    getCowTreatment(int tagNo)
    Search for the cow with the given tagNo If found get number of treatments that it has After getting the size of treatments display them in a loop
    void

    Searching for the cow with the given tag No If found search with the given Date in treatments list If there is a treatment with given Date display it If could not found with spesific information display relevant error message

  • Method Details

    • addCow

      public void addCow()
      Method to add a cow object into the arraylist;cows Requesting required information to create cow object Creating a cows object with given information Adding to cows variable with cows.add

    • deleteCow

      public void deleteCow(int tagNo)
      Searching for cow with the given tagNo in the list of cows If found save the index number of the cow and delete from the cows list If not found print relevant error message
      Parameters:
      tagNo - tag number of the cow

    • listCow

      public void listCow()
      List all the cows in the list

    • searchCow

      public int searchCow(int tagNo)
      With the given tagNo searchs all the cows in the list If found return its index If not found return -1 to tell there is no cow with fiven tagNo

    • searchVet

      public int searchVet(int vetID)
      Searchs all the vets according to given vetID If found returns the index of the vet in the list If not found return -1 to tell there is no veterinary with given Vet ID
      Parameters:
      vetID - unique vet identification number of the vet
      Returns:
      index of the vet or -1

    • getCowDetails

      public void getCowDetails(int tagNo)
      Search for the cow in the list with the given tagNo If found display its details with using printDetails method in Cow class If not found display an error message
      Parameters:
      tagNo - tag number of the cow

    • addVet

      public void addVet()
      Asking user for required information to create a vet object Creates a vet object with given information Adds the created vet object into the vet list

    • deleteVet

      public void deleteVet(int vetID)
      Searching for vet object in the vets list with the given vetID If found delete the veterinary from the list of vets If not found display appropriate error message
      Parameters:
      vetID - unique vet identification number of the vet

    • listVet

      public void listVet()
      Displaying all the vets in the vets list

    • getVetDetails

      public void getVetDetails(int vetID)
      Search for the vet with the given vetID in the vets list If found display vet's details If not found display relevant error message
      Parameters:
      vetID - unique vet identification number of the vet

    • addTreatment

      public void addTreatment(int vetID, int tagNo)
      First searching if there is a vet with given ID and there is a cow with given tagNo Then asking for required information to create treatment Creating treatment object Asking how many medications there will be for this treatment Asking for necessary information to create medication object in a loop for the number of medications Iteratively assigning medications to the created treatment
      Parameters:
      vetID - unique vet identification number of the vet
      tagNo - tag number of the cow

    • getCowTreatment

      public void getCowTreatment(int tagNo)
      Search for the cow with the given tagNo If found get number of treatments that it has After getting the size of treatments display them in a loop
      Parameters:
      tagNo - tag number of the cow

    • getCowTreatment

      public void getCowTreatment(int tagNo, Date dateOfTreatment)
      Searching for the cow with the given tag No If found search with the given Date in treatments list If there is a treatment with given Date display it If could not found with spesific information display relevant error message
      Parameters:
      tagNo - tag number of the cow
      dateOfTreatment - the date which treatment has assigned to
